Title: Clickjacking on Login Page
Description: The login page does not have X-Frame-Options header.

Title: Server Banner Disclosure
Description: Web server discloses version in HTTP headers.

Title: Outdated JavaScript Library
Description: Uses jQuery 1.12.4 with known low-risk issues.
Remediation: Update to latest stable version of jQuery.

Title: Missing Security Headers
Description: Security headers like X-Content-Type-Options are missing.

Title: Information Disclosure via Robots.txt
Remediation: Remove or sanitize sensitive entries in robots.txt.
